title: MacuShield Original Plus Capsules - 90-Day Pack, Eye Health Supplement* with Lutein Zeaxanthin and Meso-Zeaxanthin + Vitamin B2 (Riboflavin) which Helps Support Normal Vision, 90 Count (Pack of 1)
features: UK No.1: MacuShield is the UK’s leading eye health supplement brand
EYE VITAMINS scientifically proven to help maintain normal vision, MacuShield Original Plus contains vitamin: B2 (riboflavin) which contributes to the maintenance of normal vision

COMBINES all three macula carotenoids: lutein (10 mg), zeaxanthin (2 mg) and meso-zeaxanthin (10 mg) - in a our LMZ3 formula, We get Lutein, Zeaxanthin and Meso-Zeaxanthin from the Mexican marigold flower. The petals are specifically used

WHAT ARE MACULAR CAROTENOIDS? They're three nutrients: Lutein, Zeaxanthin and Meso-Zeaxanthin which are found at the back of the eye, at the macula, where they form the macular pigment (yellow colour), Meso-zeaxanthin is particularly concentrated at the centre of this pigment, The macula is a specialist parts of the eye that is responsible for detailed, central vision

DEVELOPED in collaboration with leading eye experts. MacuShield Original+ is an easy to take Lutein, Zeaxanthin and Meso-Zeaxanthin soft gel capsule, containing a scientifically proven eye vitamin B2 (Riboflavin), which helps contribute to the maintenance of normal vision
MacuShield offers a unique range including Chewable, Vegetarian, Omega 3 and Gold formulas, you can find the right eye supplement product for you
description: Product Description MacuShield Original Plus is a lutein (10 mg), zeaxanthin (2 mg) and meso-zeaxanthin (10 mg) once-a-day, easy to take, eye health supplement* which combines all three macular carotenoids in a formula developed in collaboration with leading eye health* experts. Scientific research shows that these three nutrients are found at the back of the eye, at the macula, where they form the macular pigment (yellow colour). Meso-zeaxanthin is particularly concentrated at the centre of this pigment. The macula is a specialist parts of the eye that is responsible for detailed, central vision. Lutein and zeaxanthin can be found in fruits and dark green leafy vegetables and meso-zeaxanthin is present in some species of fish and seafood. The macular pigments in MacuShield are obtained from marigold petals (Tagetus Erecta). The soft gel capsule contains vitamin: B2 (riboflavin) to help maintain normal vision. *The UK’s No.1 eye health supplement brand by sales volume. To verify, contact medinfo@allianceph.co.uk MacuShield Original+ contains vitamin B2. MacuShield Gold contains zinc which each contribute to the maintenance of normal vision. MacuShield Original Plus Omega 3 contains Vitamin B2 and 250 mg of DHA, which each help to maintain normal vision, the beneficial effect is obtained with a daily intake of 250mg of DHA Ingredients Sunflower seed oil, capsule shell (gelling agent: bovine gelatin, humectant: glycerol, colour: red iron oxide E172), marigold extract (of which 15% is combined lutein, meso-zeaxanthin, dl-alphatocopherol, zeaxanthin), thickener: beeswax yellow, riboflavin. Directions Take one softgel capsule daily with a meal. Manufacturer Contact Information Alliance Pharmaceuticals Ltd. See more
